Class UserClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.UserClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class UserClientThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The class to run for every user and send request to the server Created by cdemet08 on 9/24/16.
